wikipedia_page.main: Paul Garrod Dixey (born 2 November 1987) is a former English professional cricketer. He played County Cricket as a right-handed batsman and wicket-keeper.

response: Fast bowler Amjad Khan left Kent at the end of the 2010 season to join Sussex, having been at the county since 2001.Amjad Khan to join Sussex, The Argus, 2010-9-14. Retrieved 2017-01-27. Second XI wicket-keeper Paul Dixey also left after the end of the season and signed for Leicestershire.
